popularityCurve.label: although black americans have typically been the klan's primary target it also has attacked jews immigrants homosexuals and until recently catholics over the years since it was formed in december 1865 the klan has typically seen itself as a christian organization although in modern times klan groups are motivated by a variety of theological and political ideologies
